name: Dog Age
description:
REQUIRES RPG MAKER RTP: https://www.rpgmakerweb.com/download/additional/run-time-packages

This game was made in 8hrs for the WikiHow Game Jam that we saw was done in 10hrs and we just decided we were gonna make a submission.

https://itch.io/jam/random-wikihow-jam

Our page was How to Determine your Dogs Age:

https://www.wikihow.com/Determine-Your-Dog%27s-Age

Had no prior knowledge of rpg maker coming into this and finding good guides for rpg maker 2003 in 2020 was a bit tough but we did get through it.
